channel.title: Twice Removed
channel.description: A new family history podcast hosted by A.J. Jacobs. They say we’re one big family: this is the show that proves it. You will be filled with delight… or abject horror. You never know. It’s family.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A new family history podcast from Gimlet Media. They say we're one big family: this is the show that proves it.
channel.itunes:author: Gimlet
channel.itunes:summary: A new family history podcast hosted by A.J. Jacobs. They say we’re one big family: this is the show that proves it. You will be filled with delight… or abject horror. You never know. It’s family.
